turns.text: Well what kind of garden do you have
turns.label: qw

turns.text: Well weve tried having - let me turn the off weve tried having vegetable garden and Im from Chicago and the way that uh bugs and weeds grow down here is very different from Chicago And we have tried several years in row and weve given up between the fire ants the pill bugs the weeds the drought and hundred and ten degree heat all Summer and we just kind of uh decided to go with few flowers and give up on the vegetable garden
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh
turns.label: b

turns.text: We had to put so much poison out on everything that we thought Whod want to eat that stuff
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: You know so we have really been frustrated by our gardening attempts here and uh if you really water lot you can do it but you know when you have to pay for water it really gets to be an annoyance to have to water constantly
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: So right now were just -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Do you have lawn
turns.label: qy

turns.text: Yeah we we just try to maintain the lawn and the shrubs right now and the trees We have peach tree Thats the extent of our um contributing to our food supply But thats nice to have but
turns.label: b

turns.text: Oh yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: Yeah yeah So what do you do up there
Well um actually it - weve sort of had an ideal Spring
Um
And um the the peonies have been out for now about three weeks --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh wow
turns.label: ba

turns.text: -- and the roses have been blooming for two weeks and the grass is uh this lush green and of course Ive got lots of weeds in mine because I dont use any poison either
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: But um you know I just keep looking at - and I say Jeez you know this is the first year its been so perfect
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Really Gosh
turns.label: b

turns.text: But and my garden you know - my tomatoes are two and half feet tall --
Oh boy --
turns.label: ba

turns.text: -- the plants and -
-- that sounds wonderful
turns.label: ba

turns.text: you know Im - Im going Gee this cant you know - well have freeze
turns.label: sd(^q)

turns.text: If you dont have frost youll be all right Thats what I remember from living up north is that youd get everything set and then youd have frost and half the stuff would get frostbitten and youd have to -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well thats it Last year I think it was you know my peonies were were budding in January and you know there was no way that was going to make it and sure enough you know we - had really mild weather until --
turns.label: ba

turns.text: Wow
turns.label: ba

turns.text: -- I think it was May or something --
uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and then you know everything just got hit hard
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh boy thats frustrating
turns.label: ba

turns.text: So but yeah it its interesting and I enjoy gardening My son does the mowing of the grass
Oh yeah my husband does that thank goodness because I thats not pleasure for me
turns.label: b

turns.text: I dont think thats pleasure for anybody the - the mowing
turns.label: sd

turns.text: I love gardens that are well tended and I just - theres been few different places Ive lived where Ive just - - I dont know whether its little old ladies living there or what but you could just tell that they had love uh love affair with their gardens with beautiful wild flowers and just - I love the host of colors that just keep coming all you know year long And uh I I was in England once and thats one thing that impressed me so much is no matter what size yard somebody had they had beautiful garden in it You know it could be three feet by four feet or something
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: So I do admire that but I havent really put uh too much energy into it Course we have two little kids that are two and three years old
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh they help you
turns.label: sv

turns.text: So that has put crimp in my every activity other than diapers and laundry Ill tell you
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh dear Oh but thats nice you know I mean the peach tree is is start and -
turns.label: ba

turns.text: Tha- - yeah thats really lovely I would love to have different fruit trees Its its been wonderful to have the peaches Theyre just delicious And we we ha- we have still have to spray some but we dont have to just asphyxiate ourself with the poison which is good because I just - I cant see the point in doing that and eating anything out of it afterwards
Right What about tomatoes arent they pretty hardy
turns.label: b

turns.text: Um weve tried them but again its just like the sun scorch
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh
turns.label: b

turns.text: Weve tried them in kind of halfway in the shade and halfway in the - - I mean its just - you really really
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: have to be prepared to water constantly during the Summer People that have been successful out here have done this drip irrigation --
Oh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and installed that and um thats really what makes the most sense because you dont have to use so much water and -- -
uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- it really does the job But its just amazing how hot and dry and for how long it gets out here And if youre not really committed to it - I mean me Im you know Im real committed to it for about week and then I forget about it for week and then I go Oh yeah I need to do something and by then its burned up you know
turns.label: sv

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: Its just too distracting right now with these little ones in our lives so maybe when I get older Ill find uh some joy in that
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well I would - assume too I mean youve got three or four months youre talking about --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- of of bad weather
Yeah it just gets so hot so fast here We dont have really Spring or Fall --
turns.label: b

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and it just uh immediately heats up So thats one thing I miss about living up north as I remember um you know the long Springs and long Falls and the cooler weather It was really nice
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: We always had gardens when I was uh living in Chicago In fact my mother once tore up our entire back yard and redid it Ill never forget Got my stepfather to put in uh waterfall and little pond in one corner I mean that was like the most energy invested in anything in the whole time I ever knew him They remodeled the entire back yard Then they sold the house and got divorced so I dont know what that says about it all
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh dear
turns.label: ba

turns.text: Oh but she used to love to do stuff like that
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Sounds like it would have been pretty
turns.label: ba

turns.text: Yeah it really was I enjoyed it there But maybe when the boys get little older well do some more planting because they like to see things grow Theyve done couple of little seed projects and so I think it would be fun for them
turns.label: b

turns.text: Oh sure sure
turns.label: ba

turns.text: Yeah yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: Well it sounds like you youve got your hands full
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Oh yes Theyre both running around now
turns.label: aa

turns.text: And you know gardening isnt isnt high on the list but its not off the list
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah well its very therapeutic I think really to get out there and dig in the dirt
turns.label: b

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: you know They certainly enjoy that part of it Its just trying to keep anything I planted bulbs last uh Fall on the side guard and when I went out there in the Spring and the first day they came out the little one went and pulled all the flowers off and the flower petals were scattered all over the walk
Oh
turns.label: b

turns.text: He thought what are these fun toys that mommy put out here with all these colors for me to play with At least he didnt eat them I mean I guess I could be thankful for that

turns.label: b
